author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Add a utility function (PrintGeomSolids) in SimG4Core/PrintGeomInfo to print all solids with their shape type

#### PR validation:

Use the test cfg's in SimG4Core/PrintGeomInfo/test/python

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-sum105 Add a utility function to print all solids with their shape type
